department: Ministere des travaux publics et des services gouvernementaux
description: On behalf of Public Health Agency of Canada, Public Services Procurement Canada has a requirement to purchase one (1) ride-on floor scrubber.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Invitation to Bid: Ride-on Floor Scrubber

**Reference Number:** WS4147386204-Doc4149707472

**Amendment Number:** 1

**Solicitation Number:** WS4147386204

**Publication Date:** October 30, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** November 23, 2023, at 14:00 HNE

**Amendment Date:** November 1, 2023

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:** None specified

**Regions of Delivery:** Ottawa, Ontario

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

**Contact Information:**

* Chantal DesGroseilliers, (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [chantal.desgroseilliers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:chantal.desgroseilliers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17848578?extsite=MTc4NDg1NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17848578?extsite=MTc4NDg1NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Tender Description:** Public Services and Procurement Canada on behalf of Public Health Agency of Canada requires the purchase of one (1) ride-on floor scrubber. The goods are to be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario. The deadline to submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions is November 23, 2023, at 14:00 HNE. All bids submitted after this time will not be considered.

#### Requirements

* The successful bidder will be required to deliver one (1) ride-on floor scrubber to Ottawa, Ontario.
* The goods must meet all relevant specifications and standards.
* The successful bidder will be required to provide all necessary warranties and guarantees for the goods supplied.

#### Evaluation Criteria

* The tender will be evaluated on the basis of the lowest price of the bid submitted.
